name: Successful login with valid credentials

testSteps.description: 1: Successful login with valid credentials ({username=admin, password=serenity})

children.description: Given the user is on the login page
Angey opens the browser at https://demo.serenity.is/

When the user enters valid credentials
| username | password |
| admin | serenity |
